gpigb.store

Class MongoStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • gpigb.classloading.Patchable
      • gpigb.store.MongoStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Store

    public class MongoStore
extends Patchable
implements Store
    A file store which connects to a locally running Mongo NoSQL store on the default port.
